Advice for founders launching tokens on DEXes:

Do not make the contract address public before hand.

Ensure nobody has it. 

Address should not be public, and should not be leaked to insiders.

If the address is made public then volume will be much larger at first, driven by‚Ä¶

The Fed has become extremely effective at dealing with crises and liquidity events. It has a large array of tools at its disposal that it did not have decades ago. It is considerably more experienced. This is why extrapolating how markets reacted to past crises from decades ago‚Ä¶

Regional banks blowing up would not send the US towards a hard landing. At most this would accelerate the Fed's easing bias. Commercial real estate tanking, which drives regional banks stocks, is not a beta trade but a highly idiosyncratic trade.
